sentence: Professional and informative game rangers an expansive selection of game including the big five amazing bird life excellent customer service and food make Phinda a pleasure to visit
The rangers do not rush you and help you savour every moment of those sightings
Also we saw many animals that we wanted to such as wild dogs it is pretty rare to find them hyenas hippos etc
What a delight to experience this place out in the never neversBeautiful Lodge with every convenience available
The staff went out of their way to make our trip spectacular
The outside shower and mini pool add a great touch
Thank you beyond for a really beautiful snake free two days
We will definitely be back and this experience has left us keen to try other andbeyond safaris around Africa and would recommend andbeyond to friends and family
We were able to get so close to them and the pictures turn out great
If you ever have the opportunity make Phinda your destination Thanks Phinda Alana W
Food for Vegans was very very bad
Felt like a spa and was just what I needed after the chilly wind on the drive
We wanted to search for cheetah
Our ranger Righardt or Ric in an unfairly negative review was awesome and catered to our every request
We were even joined by some monkies and nyala at the pool
Game drives were as expected very personal and top class
We were very fortunate with our sightings of all big 5 but it was good to also see and hear about the smaller less obvious offerings of the reserve
You have a ranger call you in the morning sometimes too early to let you know the coast is clear lions etc are known to roam free and sadly a few people have been caught out
If you are on a once in a lifetime trip which our safari was then you do not have room for this kind of error and inability to provide customer satisfaction
Unfortunately the bnthatched roofs were musty and smelled so bad we had to sleep wioth the doors open
The stay included two long safari drives per day one at dawn one at dusk
